content:
Everybody, please, if you want to acknowledge somebody who helped you with working on this project, add it to this paragraph:
image.png
And afterwards, whether or not you add somebody, please add v here:
image.png
If you are among the authors who don't have access to the Overleaf document, please, send me a private message or leave a comment in this thread, and I will add the acknowledgement and/or the checkmark for you.
I don't have access to the overleaf document, would you please add a checkmark for me?
